alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 7:04PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Tooele County through 730 PM MDT... At 703 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles west of Knolls to 7 miles west of Delle. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of up to 58 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Delle, Knolls and Clive. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 26 and 69. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
